object.name: setBusinessAccountProfilePhoto
object.description: Changes the profile photo of a managed business account. Requires the can_edit_profile_photo business bot right. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Changes the profile photo of a managed business account. Requires the can_edit_profile_photo business bot right. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Changes the profile photo of a managed business account. Requires the *can_edit_profile_photo* business bot right. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the business connection
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the business connection
annotations.name: business_connection_id

annotations.description: The new profile photo to set
annotations.rst_description: The new profile photo to set
annotations.name: photo

annotations.description: Pass True to set the public photo, which will be visible even if the main photo is hidden by the business account's privacy settings. An account can have only one public photo.
annotations.html_description: Pass True to set the public photo, which will be visible even if the main photo is hidden by the business account's privacy settings. An account can have only one public photo.
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` to set the public photo, which will be visible even if the main photo is hidden by the business account's privacy settings. An account can have only one public photo.
annotations.name: is_public
